Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you're there, right? I'm coming
in.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, princess. The wedding
attire arrived, so I thought I'd bring
it over.
<PAGE>
The ceremony is coming up soon, after
all. Why don't you decide what you're
going to wear.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What I'm wearing? A tuxedo of course!
Still have to decide on the color,
though.
<PAGE>
Well, it is your special day, so how
about you pick the color you like?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You seem pretty happy, princess. Your
happiness is the most important thing to
me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, the choices are black, gray,
or white. What color is good with you?
Black
Gray
White

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a black tuxedo... All right, I'll go
with this one. Look forward to me
wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a gray tuxedo... All right, I'll go
with this one. Look forward to me
wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a white tuxedo... All right, I'll go
with this one. Look forward to me
wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now it's your turn, <MYNAME>.
You wanna try on a dress
and hair accessory set?
Try one on
Don't try on anything

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are two different dress styles,
so choose the one you like.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So what will it be? Which do you
wanna try on?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, got ya. Why don't you try it on?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Suits you very well, princess...
Enough to make me want to come
over there and hug you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what's the call? Want to go with
this set?
I want to try on another set.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right, understood. I'll let them
know you're going with that dress.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I've got to get going soon. It's
a big, once-in-a-lifetime event we've
got coming up. Rest up, okay?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No need to try anything on, huh?
Well then, which dress will it be?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, very well. I'll let them know
that's the dress you're going with.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I came over to discuss attire for the
wedding. The ceremony is coming up,
so we better decide what to wear!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What am I going to wear, you ask? A
tuxedo!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>But I wonder what color I should go
for. I'm going back and forth on it.
<PAGE>
So, I thought I would see which color
you like, <MYNAME>. Is it OK to ask for
your input?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad to hear that. You really saved
me the trouble of deciding. Thanks!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's see, the choices are black, gray,
or white. What should I go with?
Black
Gray
White

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a black tuxedo... All right, I'll go
with this one. Look forward to me
wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a gray tuxedo... All right, I'll go
with this one. Look forward to me
wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a white tuxedo... All right, I'll go
with this one. Look forward to me
wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now it's your turn, <MYNAME>. I brought
some dresses over. You wanna try one on?
Try one on
Don't try on anything

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, I brought over two different
dresses.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which one do you wanna try on?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay! Well then, try it on.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... It really suits you. You
look so beautiful with it on.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what's the call? Want to go with
this dress?
I want to try on another dress.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay! This dress it is then.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I've got to get going soon. I'm
really looking forward to the big day!
See you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No need to try anything on, huh? Well
then, which dress will it be?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, so you'll go with that dress. Got
it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you there? I'm coming in.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there, <MYNAME>. It seems the
wedding attire for our big day came in.
<PAGE>
I thought it would be nice if you decide
on the clothing, so I brought it over.
That sound good to you?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, what am I going to wear? A tuxedo of
course! Just have to settle on the
color.
<PAGE>
Well, even a standard tuxedo should
be a sight to see since it's so
different from what I normally wear.
<PAGE>
Ah, that's right. It is your special
day, <MYNAME>, so do you wanna pick
the color of my tux?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad to hear it. I was at a bit of
a loss since I don't I really have
any sense about this kind of stuff.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's see, the choices are black, gray,
or white. Which color tuxedo sounds good
to you?
Black
Gray
White

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a black tuxedo... All right, I'll
go with this one. Look forward to
me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a gray tuxedo... All right, I'll
go with this one. Look forward to
me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a white tuxedo... All right, I'll
go with this one. Look forward to
me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now it's your turn, <MYNAME>. You want
to try on a dress?
Try one on
Don't try on anything

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I brought over a couple different
dresses.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which one do you wanna try on?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Got ya. Hurry up and try it on.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Ah, <MYNAME>, you've done me in.
It's even cuter on you than I imagined.
You look great in it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what's the call? Want to go with
this dress?
I want to try on another dress.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right, this dress it is then.
I've got to say that I'm also a
fan of it myself.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I've got to get going soon. I'm
getting more and more excited about
the wedding! See you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, so you won't be trying anything
on? That's too bad. Anyway, choose
a dress for the ceremony.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, so you'll go with that dress?
I've got to say that I'm also a
fan of it myself.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you in? I'm coming inside.
Please excuse me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How do you do, <MYNAME>? The wedding
attire has arrived.
<PAGE>
There are multiple variations, so I
thought I would bring them over so that
you can choose. Let's decide together.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What of my attire? I'll be wearing a
standard tuxedo. I don't think anything
too flashy would suit me.
<PAGE>
However, there are three colors that I
am struggling to decide between. <MYNAME>,
would you mind choosing one?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you very much. That's a relief.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, the choices are black, gray,
or white. Which color tuxedo do you
prefer.
Black
Gray
White

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a black tuxedo... Very well, I'll
go with this one. Look forward to
me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a gray tuxedo... Very well, I'll
go with this one. Look forward to
me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So a white tuxedo... Very well, I'll
go with this one. Look forward to
me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I believe it is now your turn, <MYNAME>.
Would you like to try out some different
dress and hair accessory sets?
Try on a set
Don't try on anything

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I brought over two dresses. And there
are two hair accessory choices, as well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which one would you like to try on?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see. By all means, please try it on.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... It really suits you. It's
very charming on you indeed.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you like to go with this dress?
I want to try on another dress.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you'll be going with this dress? I
understand. Thank you for deciding.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I must go relay our wedding attire
choices to the proper parties. I'm
looking forward to our big day. See you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right then, I understand. In
that case, please choose which
dress you would like to wear.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This one, right? I've got it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. I got the
wedding attire from Hana, so I thought
I'd bring it over here.
<PAGE>
Seems like there a few styles, so
pick which one you'd like to wear for
the ceremony.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My attire? I'll be in a standard tuxedo.
It's your special day, so I don't want
to steal your thunder.
<PAGE>
But there are a few color choices that
I'm having trouble deciding between.
<MYNAME>, will you pick one for me?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks. You're really helping me out.
Besides, it's just safer if you're the
one that decides!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's see, for tuxedo colors we have
black, gray, or white. Which one
do you like?
Black
Gray
White

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Black... OK, got it. Sure thing if
that's what you want. Look forward
to me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gray... OK, got it. Sure thing if
that's what you want. Look forward
to me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
White... OK, got it. Sure thing if
that's what you want. Look forward
to me wearing it on the big day!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Next up is your attire, <MYNAME>.
What will it be? You wanna try
something on?
Try something on
Don't try on anything

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, I brought over a couple
different dresses.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which one do you wanna try on?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
OK, go try it on then. I'll be waiting.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
...It's... Ah... It really suits you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You wanna wear that set to the wedding?
I want to try on another dress.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you'll go with that set then. Got
it. I'll go let Hana know.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, that does it for me. I'm really
looking forward to the big day! See
you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Well then, decide which dress
you want to wear to the wedding.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'll go with that dress. OK, got it.
I'll let Hana know.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's Amir. I'm coming inside
now.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. The wedding attire
has arrived from my country, so I
brought it on over.
<PAGE>
There are multiple choices, so I was
hoping that you could help choose. Let's
decide together.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What of my attire? I have some
of my prince's clothing that I'm
thinking of wearing.
<PAGE>
I think the coloring of it is pretty
nice. Look forward to seeing me
wear it on the big day.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, let's decide what you'll
be wearing, <MYNAME>. Would you
like to try something on?
Try something on
Don't try on anything

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, I brought over two dresses.
I believe either one would suit you
nicely.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, which dress would you
like to try out?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I understand. Well then, go and try it
on.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, it suits you oh so well.
You really do look like a princess,
you know.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's your decision. Will you go with
this dress?
I want to try on another dress.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Very well then. I will let Sanjay know.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, that does it for me. I'm really
looking forward to the big day! See
you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Well then, here are the choices.
Please decide which dress you want
to wear to the wedding.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'll go with that dress. OK, I
understand. I'll let Sanjay know.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm
coming on in, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you've gotta hear this! The
wedding attire came in!
<PAGE>
I brought it on over, so do you wanna
decide what to wear with me?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What am I wearing? Actually, I've
narrowed it down to a couple of
candidates.
<PAGE>
There are two options I like, but
I can't make up my mind about
which to go for.
<PAGE>
That's why I'd like to ask which one
you prefer, <MYNAME>. How does that
sound?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad to hear that! I didn't want to
have choose myself. Thanks!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, which set sounds good
to you, <MYNAME>?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. So the lovely dress and
headdress it is.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. So the lovely dress and
veil it is.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. So the chic dress and
headdress it is.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. So the chic dress and
veil it is.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. Look forward to
seeing me wear it on the big day!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, it looks like it's your
turn next, <MYNAME>. You wanna
try on the tuxedo I brought?
Try it on
Don't try it on

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I actually brought three different
styles with me.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We've got black, gray, and
white. Which tuxedo do you
wanna try on?
Black
Gray
White

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay! Give it a try.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Ah, yes. That suits you nicely.<RED>∀</RED>
That looks very attractive on you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, you want to go with this tuxedo?
I want to try on another one.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
OK! That's the tux. It's decided then.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right then, I'll be heading home
now. I can't wait for the big day! See
you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, so no need to try anything on, I
see. Well, do you wanna decide which
tuxedo you'll wear?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay! That's the tuxedo.
It's decided then.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in
now.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, some samples have come in
from the wedding dress that Yuri said
she'd make.
<PAGE>
I brought the samples on over here. Will
you help me decide on our wedding
attire?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What do I want to wear? Actually, I've
got a couple of candidates lined up.
<PAGE>
There are two options, but they both
look so great on me that I can't decide
which to go for.
<PAGE>
So I was thinking that I'd wear
whatever you pick out, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Tee-hee. I'd thought you'd say that.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right then, which one sounds good
to you, <MYNAME>?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. So the lovely dress and
headdress it is.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. So the lovely dress and
veil it is.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. So the chic dress and
headdress it is.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. So the chic dress and
veil it is.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. Don't get too blown
away by my cuteness on the wedding day.
Anyway, look forward to it.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, it looks like it's your
turn next, <MYNAME>. You wanna
try on a tuxedo?
Try one on
Don't try on anything

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Got it. So there are three varieties
of tuxedos I brought over.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Out of these colors, which one do
you wanna wear?
Black
Gray
White

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
That tuxedo, right? Go and try
it on then. I'll check out how it
looks on you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Hmm... That looks pretty good on you.
Not bad at all.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, you wanna go with this tuxedo?
I want to try on another one.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I've got it. I'll let Yuri know.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
All right, that does it for me. We'll be
living together in this house soon,
so make sure it's all good to go, okay?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You're not going to try anything on?
That's no fun. Anyway, choose which
color you want out of these three.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I've got it. I'll let Yuri know.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>... I'm coming
inside.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I made some samples...for our
wedding attire. I brought them
over... Do you want to choose?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My dress? Well... I narrowed it down
to a couple candidates.
<PAGE>
There are two options. <MYNAME>...
will you decide?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
...Thanks.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Choose please. Which dress do you like?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
A chic dress and headdress
A chic dress and veil

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, got it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, got it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, got it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, got it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>... Look forward
to our big day.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well... It's your turn next, <MYNAME>.
Wanna try on a tuxedo?
Try one on
Don't try on anything

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
OK. There are three colors...

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which one do you wanna try?
Black
Gray
White

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. Go and try it on.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
...Very attractive. It really suits
you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Want to go with this tuxedo?
I want to try on another one.
I'll go with this one.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
OK, so this tuxedo it is. I'll tailor
it for you.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've got to get back to tailoring the
clothes. <MYNAME>, please look
forward to our big day. Bye now.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I see. There are three colors of
tuxedos... Which will you wear?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
OK, so this tuxedo it is. I'll tailor
it for you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in now.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, listen to this. When I went
to my parents' home to announce the
marriage, the wedding attire arrived.
<PAGE>
Since it will be a very special
occasion, would you help me pick out our
attire?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What dress will I wear? Actually, I've
narrowed it down to a few candidates,
but I can't make a firm decision.
<PAGE>
Ah yes. <MYNAME>, it you don't mind,
can you choose one for me?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you very much. That makes
me happy.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, these are the two dresses.
Which one do you like?
A lovely dress and headdress
A lovely dress and veil
